column4: How can I get bash_completion to work with ssh? It used to work, but now ubuntu uses hashed known_hosts file, so as far as I can see, bash_completion haven't been updated to work with the new known_hosts format
Works in zsh for me, I dunno anything about bash though
doesn't zsh have it's own completion thing similar to fish?
Nah, it depends on your configuration. I'm using oh-my-zsh, personally
